text: Shira (Hebrew: שירה) is a Hebrew female name. ==Overview== Shira means poetry or music. In 2012, it was the second most popular name given to girls born in Israel. ==Notable individuals named Shira== * Shira Haas, Israeli actress * Shira Willner, German figure skater * Shira Naor, American-born Israeli actress * Shira Rishony (born 1991), Israeli Olympic judoka * Shira Klein, professor and chair of history at Chapman University, United States ==Related pages== * Limor * Miriam * Baruch ==References==
title: Shira (given name)
